title: New Cuisine Explorer
description: Try a dish from a cuisine you’re unfamiliar with—bonus if it uses pantry staples!

title: Eggs-act Mastery
description: Fry an egg just right. Aim for a yolk that’s not too runny or too dry.

title: Cake Confidence
description: Bake a small cake without burning it—perfect for sharing or saving!

title: Spice It Right
description: Cook a dish with a balanced kick. Taste as you go!

title: Onion Eyes
description: Chop an onion without tears. Tip: chill it first!

title: Cultural Combo
description: Create a fusion dish using ingredients from two different cuisines you have at home.

title: Soufflé Tryout
description: Attempt a small soufflé—win or flop, it’s all part of the journey!

title: Pantry Power Snack
description: Make a quick snack with 3 pantry ingredients. Keep it simple!

title: Leftover Legend
description: Transform leftovers into a whole new meal. Creativity wins!

title: Creative Salad
description: Make a colorful, fun-shaped salad. Bonus if it tells a story!

title: Balanced Breakfast
description: Prepare a balanced breakfast with eggs, toast, and something sweet or fruity.

title: One-Pot Magic
description: Make a full meal using just one pot or pan—less cleanup, less waste!

title: Golden Goals
description: Bake something with a golden crust—think toast, pie, or cookies!

title: Pantry Roulette
description: Pick 5 ingredients you already have and make something tasty!

title: Perfect Pasta
description: Boil pasta to perfection. Al dente is the goal!

title: Cookie Control
description: Bake cookies and practice portioning. Try not to eat the dough!

title: Sauce Creator
description: Whip up a tasty homemade sauce using leftovers or common items.

title: Fruit Prep Pro
description: Chop or slice fruit neatly and safely. Bonus for style!

title: Microwave Magic
description: Prepare a full meal using only the microwave. Efficiency is key!

title: Picture-Perfect Plating
description: Serve a dish with care—make it look as good as it tastes.

title: Garlic Galore
description: Use garlic creatively across a full meal—don’t overdo it!

title: Toast Boss
description: Toast bread without burning it. A humble but real challenge!

title: Naturally Sweet
description: Make a dessert using fruits or natural sweeteners only.

title: Plant Power
description: Cook a vegetarian meal that’s satisfying and flavorful.

title: Bento Challenge
description: Create a tidy and tasty bento box using leftovers or small portions.

title: Water Works
description: Boil, steam, or poach an ingredient without oil.

title: Home Restaurant
description: Recreate your favorite restaurant dish at home with available ingredients.

title: Sauce Trio
description: Make three small sauces to pair with one dish. Avoid waste!

title: Picky Palate Pleaser
description: Cook a meal for someone with specific tastes and surprise them.

title: Tool Time
description: Try using a kitchen tool you rarely touch. Discover new uses!

title: Groove & Cook
description: Prepare a meal while listening to music—bonus if you dance while cleaning!

title: Smoothie Scientist
description: Create a smoothie with 3+ fruits and one unique twist. Think sustainably!

title: Scrap Chef
description: Make a meal using scraps or peelings you'd usually throw away.

title: Lunchbox Wizard
description: Make a full lunch that fits in a small container—ideal for zero waste!
